creator: mbennett6@kc.rr.com
text:
It would be nice to have the Copy task have a purge option to delete any files
on the target directory that are not on the source directory.  This option could
have to possible values, true or false.  This would make Copy more like the
robocopy program.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text: You want <sync> which is in CVS HEAD and will be part of Ant 1.6.
